channel.title: Personal on Kristoffer Lind - Developer, Technologist, Blogger
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Kristoffer Lind - Developer, Technologist, Blogger

item.title: Who am I?
item.description: I’m Kristoffer Lind, a swedish software engineer and site reliability engineer. I currently work at the Lund branch of tretton37. I’ve been curious about technology all my life and in the business since 2009. Too much information I was a sergeant and systems technician for communication systems in the military. Following that I was in the family business for a couple of years, working as a stonemason doing mostly kitchen countertops in granite.
